pr_title: [#9536] Implement E2E test data validity check

timeline.message: Change all test course/google IDs according to rule

timeline.bodyText: Google ID was never a searchable field; email is. This passed before because the google ID happened to be the same as the email minus domain.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.bodyText: I don't find it necessary to change this only for production server
timeline.author: wkurniawan07
